channel.title: Cube God
channel.description:
Yeah I'm going back into modeling after all these years. Downloaded Metasquoia today.
This is a boss in Realm of the Mad God but it's in 3d now cause Realm of the Mad God is a 2d game. [b]Expect more Realm art from me.[/b] https://forums.wildshadow.com/wiki/realm-mad-god/cube-god <---- info on the cube god
This could be added to a Runescape server but I forgot how to make custom NPC as it's been awhile.
Rendered image: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EiESJhP.png[/img]
Here's the wireframe. IT'S VERY CLEAN [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sRgkSqz.png[/img]
Tomorrow I will probably make it's projectiles, and figure out how to add it in game.

item.title: Cube God
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“kingman002, post:14, topic:526572”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=645316.msg4342456#msg4342456 date=1375334449]

What am I looking at? It looks like a blue primitive. I know it’s to that cube game but still

You are looking at THE cube god. All it’s just a blue cube. Nothing else.

Wow, what a fr00b.
[/quote]
k cube god can 1 hit ur little 99 hp ass.[/quote]
::god
::invinc

Read full topic

item.title: Cube God
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

When i first read the title, i thought it would be a cube because you were new… then i realised it isn’t due to ignorance for the program but because of the game.

I can see that the back line isn’t in place to the others, what’s that about?

Read full topic

item.title: Cube God
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

eyeownyew:

I think you should have used primitives. Also, you could use some work reducing poly count. Nice work though.

yeh, the poly count was a little too high to add to a rsps… wtf is a primeteve??

Read full topic
